response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the burger out of the fridge. The burger is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to heat the burger.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the burger out of the fridge
(3) Heat the burger
(4) Open the top cabinet
(5) Take the platter out of the top cabinet
(6) Place the heated burger on the platter
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Heat the burger
    hamburger = registry(env,"hamburger_85")
    heat(robot, hamburger)
    donothing(env)
